title: Spicy Sausage and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['1.5 litres chicken stock', '1 onion, chopped', '3 spicy Italian sausages or any highly spiced sausage', '3 large potatoes, cubed', '1 bunch fresh spinach, washed and chopped', '4 tablespoons evaporated milk', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
